landing.title: DPR Assessment
landing.heading: AI-Powered DPR Quality Assessment & Risk Prediction
landing.subheading: Transform infrastructure project evaluation with intelligent quality scoring, fraud detection, geospatial validation, and predictive risk simulation.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Comprehensive tools for complete DPR lifecycle management and assessment
landing.aiScoringDesc: Intelligent evaluation of completeness, feasibility, financial viability, and risk with explainable AI insights.
landing.fraudDetectionDesc: Automatic identification of duplicate content, plagiarism, and suspicious patterns across all DPRs.
landing.geospatialDesc: Interactive maps with risk zone visualization and project location verification.
landing.simulationDesc: Predictive what-if scenarios for cost, timeline, and resource adjustments with real-time impact analysis.
landing.rbacDesc: Secure workflows for Officials, Reviewers, and Admins with complete audit trails.
landing.reportsDesc: Generate professional PDF and Excel reports with comprehensive analysis and recommendations.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your DPR Assessment?
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join government departments using AI-powered analysis for infrastructure projects
landing.footer: Â© 2024 DPR Assessment System. Built for Government Infrastructure Projects.

dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's an overview of your DPR assessment activities.
